short_description_localized.en: Accessibility and exclusivity combine in perfect harmony in this one bedroom/two bathroom suite. Enjoy maximum comfort in 526-748 square feet of space with extraordinary views of New York City.
short_description_localized.es: Accessibility and exclusivity combine in perfect harmony in this one bedroom/two bathroom suite. Enjoy maximum comfort in 526-748 square feet of space with extraordinary views of New York City.

description_localized.en:
Delight in this oversize accessible suite with traditional furnishings, where you can soak up breathtaking views of the New York City architecture. 

With a private bedroom, separate living area, kitchenette, elegant marble bathrooms and accessible features, this suite is your chance to relax, revel and refresh. You’ll enjoy a tranquil environment in 526-748 square feet of space with entrance door width of 34.75” and bathroom door width of 35.25”.
description_localized.es:

images.name: Handicap-Accessible-One-Bedroom-Suite-One-Bedroom-Suite-Living-Room---View-from-Kitchenette
images.caption: One Bedroom Suite Living Room - View from Kitchenette
images.description: This living room includes a TV, dresser, sleeper sofa, arm chair, dining table with a chair, window, and coffee table,.
images.alt: On the left wall, a sleeper sofa sits opposite a suspended TV above a dresser. Between the two, a coffee table. On the back wall is a large window with a chair sitting in front of it. Opposite the window is a dining table with one chair seated at it.
